attributes.action: Help stop them banning xl bully’s
attributes.additional_details: Perhaps banned the owners that can’t train their dogs properly then that might bring all dog attacks down instead of singling dogs out
attributes.background: Not banned xl bully’s there’s nothing wrong with them it’s all to do with how people bring them up I have one that’s soft as anything and great with everyone never have any issues with him and I no a lot of people with them that don’t have any problems so instead of banning xl bully’s

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
